expo.name: NüV
expo.description: A 'life(style) support system' for vegans and vegetarians. A communal hub for all things that concern the ethical and healthy eaters amongst us

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: NüV needs to access your photo library to save a photo which shows you at your best.
